author: Rob Goldberg
title: MLB, Fanatics Agree to Produce Masks, Gowns Instead of Jerseys Amid COVID-19
description: Fanatics executive chair Michael Rubin announced Thursday he will convert a factory that makes MLB jerseys into one that makes masks and gowns for health workers. The products will go to help those dealing with the outbreak of the coronavirus...
content:
Matt Rourke/Associated Press
Fanatics CEO Michael Rubin announced Thursday he has converted a factory that makes MLB jerseys into one that makes masks and gowns for health workers. 
The products will go to frontline medical workers and hospitals working to … [+2041 chars]
